website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one appliance perfect kitchen gadget lovers with minimal storage space.
pros: The ChefWave is a bargain considering buyers get three appliances in one: air fryer, rotisserie, and dehydrator
The powerful 1600W machine also features a myriad of presets for an easy one-touch cooking experience

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of recipes and was very pleased with the results. It is uncomplicated and easy to use. First request from the kids was fries and they came out crispy on the outside and soft on the inside just like fries should be. We also tried the skewers with marinated vegetables - we had to read the manual to figure how to put the cage together, but we figured it out. All in all it was a great buy and I'm sure this air fryer will be used often in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally not as described!
customer_reviews.text: This product boast about it is 12.6 qt size it isis only 10.58 qt. A miss truth in the discription,the rotisserie is much small tham discribed
customer_reviews.author: Ron Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chicken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after a friend told me about the great rotisserie chicken his air fryer made. The day it arrived I made my first chicken in it and it was delicious! I have used the dehydrator as well and it took a quarter of the time my normal dehydrator takes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Frey

customer_reviews.title: There were no manuals or instructions
customer_reviews.text: The product came with no instructions or manuals. There is no website to find manuals or instructions. Would not recommend it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: David Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very good size which will make this very useful
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used but 2 times and am sure I will use many more times. I ordered my son one while in TX. and for myself when I got home. It has preset foods on it and manual settings also. I am sure after I practice with it I will love it. Wish it had a book for recipes it would help.
customer_reviews.author: B farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of air fryers prior to buying this one I waned one that had a large capacity with all the bells and whistles, this air fryer didn’t disappoint. I’ve made jerky, whole chickens, fries,heated up leftovers. I’ve honestly stopped using a lot of my appliances in my kitchen since buying this. It heats up everything so quickly and everything is still moist internally. No more microwave for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Frankos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We thoroughly enjoy our ChefWave air fryer. The oven is easy to use, and there are clear instructions which makes it really simple. It has a large selection of features to choose from, and there are many different accessories that came along with the machine which makes the cooking quite simple. It's an innovative and simple way to fry, and cuts out most of the calories that come from regular frying. I had a great experience with this Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Shira A

customer_reviews.title: Great product especially 12-qt capacity
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has all the attachments needed to produce great deep fried foods without the grease. Steak Fries, Chicken Wings, all of it delicious. It would have been nice if they included a recipe book, but there are plenty on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: poor poor machine
customer_reviews.text: please don't even think about buying this product. it does not come with any instruction. it does not work, and there is no contact information either.
customer_reviews.author: lady from portland

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had several air fryers, and this is the best one yet. very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Green

customer_reviews.title: No after sale service
customer_reviews.text: The product is OK but it's the whole package that makes the difference between an OK product and a really good product. I wrote them at their customer service email requesting info on their recipe book and they never bothered replying, so I guess I'm probably on my own if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Preliminary review
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet had an opportunity to use the appliance; it arrived in great condition with all the attachments; however, upon initial inspection,, it is way smaller than I expected. I will have to return it and get the larger size. My rating is based on the small interior capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Chef G

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed.. very small .. 4 recipes... instructions not very helpful .. This is definitely one of my worse purchase. I will not return just too much hassle will try and sell on Market place. I’m sure they have some good products this isn’t one of them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just get a small oven
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever and food is dried out on outside before inside is done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions confusing.. cooking instructions inadequate.
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews, it's okay. Review was correct... the assembly instructions were confusing.. but, I figured it out. The cooking directions were woefully inadequate... the presets will have to be adjusted. I had to order another cookbook. It will take awhile to determine the effectiveness of the air fryer... I would NOT recommend it without BETTER ASSEMBLY DIRECTIONS... AND BETTER COOKING INSTRUCTIONS. ~Joseph~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A crack on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2months ago. I love it until found a crack on the wall. I used this 1-2 times a week with only their accessories. It is very narrow almost like scratch. But it is rupture shaped on the edge. I guess it got heated and then cracked.
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO O.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a great product - no instructions at all
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the product. Comes with lots of bells and whistles however no instructions on how to use anything. I call the help line and the also are no help. Emailed and have received no info back. You dont even get anything on how to use the air fryer itself. Very disappointed. Have ordered a air fryer cookbook - hopefully it will help me thru the process. Unless you already know how to use - I recommend not ordering this product from this site.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for about a week, and have only used a couple of times. I’m still trying to figure it all out, but it works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BUT...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the size of this air fryer. Hubby and I have been using a small one for a while and wanted to move up in size. Really like this one EXCEPT DOOR WILL NOT LATCH AND STAY SHUT.
customer_reviews.author: N. Suber

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work long for us
customer_reviews.text: Broke after about 3 weeks. Just stopped working. Lights would flash and beeps were heard but would not work. Still waiting to see if they are going to credit my account back, I have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer!!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is the bomb! It is large enough to fry two Cornish hens or a dozen wings to perfection. Also did chicken tenders and they were so good! Super easy to clean, would definitely recommend this oven!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I've not used for a lot yet but everything works great on it very easy to use. Perfect size to cook for my family very compact. Has everything included as it says in description.
customer_reviews.author: Teneya

customer_reviews.title: After 6 weeks, it’s broken.
customer_reviews.text: Not even 6 weeks later it’s stopped working. Made some great meals but today it crapped out on me. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bill699

customer_reviews.title: This one, is the gold standard!
customer_reviews.text: I cooked a lot of steaks, french fries, onion rings, shrimp, I have another air fryer prior to this one this one is much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this device! Easy to clean and easy to use, even without looking at the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena G

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything needed. Could be more useful if slightly wider.
customer_reviews.author: Handydoc

customer_reviews.title: Noing what you are bying i guess
customer_reviews.text: Thought it eas bigger than my 8 guart deluxe smaller. Sold it to a friend not happy
customer_reviews.author: Guido Losey

customer_reviews.title: size and Quailty
customer_reviews.text: the size is smaller than they describe works good the inside light blew out on me on the first run...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hanes

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr and dies
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly one year after purchase it quit working like a fuse blew inside of it but nothing in the instructions on how to troubleshoot that It was used probably twice A-day on average
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a family.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, simple to use, I've made a beautiful 3.5lb rotisserie chicken and a few more things already.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for gifts and have not had any negative feedback from recipients. I did notice that the rotisserie rod and attachments all use thumb screws to hold them in place but they only give you one set!
customer_reviews.author: George Couch

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Finished products are unbelievable!! Easy to use and when you are done, everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Diglvn

customer_reviews.title: To read the menu scale
customer_reviews.text: I need a flash light to see the scale at the menu setting. Only have a red light but it is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: The food tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. It is my first time using an Air Fryer and I was pleased with the results. This air fryer is high quality at a great price with all the accessories it comes with. And the frying, made the food really taste good. The taste was almost equal to real fried food, you can almost mistaken it for the regular frying. My kids, even the picky ones... ate the air-fried food till the last bite. The process is extremely simple, and not messy at all. I made breaded chicken cutlets and potato fries both tasted like they were deep fried in oil. No need for the excess oil anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Appliance EVER
customer_reviews.text: Worst kitchen appliance I have ever owned. Touch screen is great. None of the timers are right for foods other than french fries. If you go by timers on chicken and wings, they're bloody every time. Clean up makes me so angry! Steel wool won't even clean the basket. You have to soak then still use steel wool. I hate the Air Fryer. I would return it without hesitation but I through away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Carter

customer_reviews.title: did not like. Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: it is very small cooking space. When i received it it said 6.3 quart. not as it actually is. the pan that goes inside is 6.3. It says in discription 12 quart very decieving.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this air fryer oven! We previously had a basket style air fryer. This one holds a lot more, is a lot easier to clean, and I love the different racks and such! We reheat leftovers like fried chicken and French fries, I make fish sticks, chicken nuggets, roast vegetables, cook small frozen pizzas, make homemade breaded pork chops, homemade breaded chicken strips, and probably other things I can’t think of off the top of my head. Easy to use, has a permanent spot on our counter.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Serious Lack of instructions and recipes
customer_reviews.text: Just received my air dryer today. So far, 1 star. I will add to this review after I've made a few things. The reason for one star, the recipe book is a joke. A total of 6 recipes! 3 of those patato recipes. Next the instruction manual. Bare bones, minimalistic, leaving me with lots of questions and incomplete answers. I had to immediately order a recipe book with 550 recipes for 10 on Amazon. I intend to update this review after I've cooked a juicy Ribrye and other things. But out of the box, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from old one.
customer_reviews.text: I have to put this out 1st. I bought this from Black Walnut Boutique and it came used and dirty. Contacted Amazon and got a refund, sent that one in. My next purchase was from ASavings which came new still in factory box. Very happy with item. Used it for dinner 1st night it came in. Food came out crispy and moist inside. I like the controls very easy to use. Comes with allot of accessories also.
customer_reviews.author: RGV Shopper

customer_reviews.title: heat is not evently distributed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Feb 2019...it doesn't distribute the heat evenly....the food closest to the back gets most of the heat.... I was willing to deal with it....and made it work....but now it just completely died......after a year.....so no, I don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: yania frias

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Keto
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Keto diet and love that taste . Great for the Carb loading days like the forbidden fries .. yum .. this allows me to cheat , and stay in Keto .. the rotisserie is excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She used it the other night. They cooked chicken wings and french fries in it. She said it did a great job and the food was great. She said she is going to everything in it now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McC

customer_reviews.title: Very very good - delivered around 3:30 pm,  cooked mahi mahi tuna 30 minutes later, awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, read the manual (i know - but I did) , cleaned it, plugged it in, cooked some mahi mahi steaks, cooked some 'fried' potatos -cleaned it - very easy - this is a winner - and i mean a winner !!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Schwirtlich

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and great price. So simple to use! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb W

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my parents and it is easy to use except for that basket that rotates with the fries it is hard to insert into the oven but it is easier to remove
customer_reviews.author: iexplorer10

customer_reviews.title: ChefWave 12.6 Quart Air Fryer, Rotisserie and Dehydrator
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work. It was replaced in 4 days and this one works great. Be sure to read the instruction manual carefully, its very important.
customer_reviews.author: DrGizmo2002

customer_reviews.title: Great food small mess to clean up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air fryer. The food is wonderful. I would have given this 5 🌟 except the menu and control items on the console are very difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Fortino

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use According to My Daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and her boyfriend. They use it almost every night and just LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Imprezzu

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with seller
customer_reviews.text: Came missing Basket Handle,would like to have one sent.Function buttons are hard to see,would be nice if they were lighted.No cookbook,just guess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift item and by all accounts they love using it.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: ChefWave 12.6 Quart Air Fryer, Rotisserie and Dehydrator – Large Capacity 1600W Oil Free Cooker with 16 Presets and Cooking Modes - 8 Accessories - Recipes Included
product_meta.description:
Change everything you thought you knew about cooking with the ChefWave 12.6 Quart Air Fryer Oven. The unique cooking style of the state-of-the-art ChefWave Air Fryer Oven with Dehydrator and Rotisserie gives you a healthier option than conventional cooking. This amazing Air Fryer Oven can bake, roast, grill, or fry with no oil necessary! You’ll be enjoying juicy chicken, succulent steaks, crispy fries, moist cakes, dehydrated fruit, stir-fried veggies and much more all from an appliance that fits right on your countertop. This chef-quality power air fryer oven combines the cooking abilities of an air fryer, rotisserie, and dehydrator into one robust cooking machine.

Fast and Easy

Cooking with the versatile ChefWave 12-Quart AirFryer Oven is 2 to 3 times quicker than conventional cooking methods. Two-level cooking allows you to cook an entire family meal at one time. Infrared heat combined with hot turbo air in a 360° rotating system give you a unique cooking style that keeps your food crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. The digital Air Fryer has an easy-to-use digital touchscreen control panel with 16 different pre-set options and control cooking features. With 9 different cooking features as well as control of time and temperature, the airfryer oven is ready to cook anything at any time.

Versatile Functions

Equipped with a rotisserie tool, the rotisserie function can cook up to 2.7 lbs of chicken for an easy experience that will give you the juiciest meat every time. An easy to remove frying basket ensures crispy French fries, fried chicken, and more. The dehydrator allows you to dehydrate delicious fruits, vegetables, meats, and more without any added sugar.

In the Box

The Air Fryer Oven includes a hand tool, rotisserie tool, wire rack, mesh basket, frying basket, drip pan, skewer rack, baking cage and a one year Chefwave warranty. Works with 110 house voltage.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY, DELICIOUS FRYING: Enjoy the crispy deliciousness of deep fried foods without the adverse effects of oil or butter. Enjoy the same texture and taste using nothing but hot air to cook your meal. 360° air rotation ensures even cooking and uniform texture.

EXTRA LARGE CAPACITY: With a 12 liter (12.6qt) capacity, you can fit a huge load into this cooker. It even has 2 dual racks so you can cook 2 different foods at once, such as meat on top, vegetables on the bottom! Or use the entire oven to cook a big feast like an entire chicken. (5 pounds max) Total oven capacity 12.6 Quart, Basket & Rotisserie capacity 10.6 Quart

ACCESSORY LOADED: Included are 8 accessories to making cooking a breeze. A rotisserie fork, wire rack, mesh basket, frying basket, drip pan, skewer rack, baking cage, and a handle tool to handle many of the tools. The included manual lets you know how to make the most of each of them.

MULTIPLE HIGH POWER MODES: This incredible healthy cooking machine doesn’t just fry, it can also broil, grill, roast, bake, barbecue, stir-fry, defrost and dehydrate. With triple cooking power and infrared heat, turbo air and a 360° rotating system, this 1600 watt machine cooks well and cooks fast.

16 SIMPLE PRESETS: Figuring out how to cook your food is easy with 16 preset modes on the digital display. Choose from fries, chicken, pizza, steak and more, or choose a mode like defrost, dehydrate, keep warm and more. There are 8 controls including temperature, rotisserie and a timer.
